memories.text: The Celestium Codex is an ancient manuscript rumored to have been etched on sheets of crystallized starlight. Its pages shimmer with patterns that shift in response to moonlight.
Quantum Cows can teleport short distances using quantum entanglement, explaining their sudden appearances in fields surrounded by fences with no visible openings.
Mirror Cats possess reflective fur that bends light, allowing them to appear in two places at onceâ€”possibly solving the mystery of their sudden disappearances and reappearances.
